Olga Ann Foyert

  1. Foster Name: Unknown
  2. Foster Family: John and Anna Klein
  3. Location of Family: Ewing, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Ewing, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 4
  7. Date of Birth: 3/1/1908, NY
  8. Date of Death: 5/18/2001, Gregory, SD
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Olga Rice
  11. Spouse Name: Charlie Rice
  12. Source: OTR, 344; Crossroads, June 1995, 12-13; "Ancestry;" Rapid City Journal (obit); 1910 United States Federal Census.
